desc.f: Filters the skus based on the location specified in this parameter. This can be an azure region or global
desc.to: Filters the skus based on the location specified in this parameter. This can be an Azure region or global

sch.v: The list of catalogs and pagination information.

billingPlans.desc: The billing plan options available for this SKU.

name.desc: An invariant to describe the feature.

v.desc: An invariant if the feature is measured by quantity.

items.desc: The set of locations that the SKU is available. If not specified, the SKU is available in all locations.

currencyCode.desc: The ISO 4217 3-letter currency code for the currency used by this purchase record.

resourceType.desc: The type of resource the SKU applies to.

values.desc: The value of restrictions. If the restriction type is set to location. This would be different locations where the SKU is restricted.

v.desc: An invariant if the feature is measured by quantity.

terms.desc: Available reservation terms for this resource
